title: Proverbs 29:17
verses: Correct your son, and he will give you rest; Yes, he will give delight to your soul.

verses: Fathers, do not provoke your children, lest they become discouraged.

title: Proverbs 29:15
verses: The rod and rebuke give wisdom, But a child left to himself brings shame to his mother.

title: Proverbs 23:13-14
verses: Do not withhold discipline from a child; if you punish them with the rod, they will not die. Punish them with the rod and save them from death.
